name: Blip-Blop Takeover
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

A species of Blip-Blops has accidentally been released from the laboratory. These seemingly harmless blobs are an extinction level threat to the unaware civilian population. They can take over the consciousness of a civilian just by coming in contact with them. Lucky for you, you play as the Blip-Blops.

Take control of all the civilians before they reach the Safe Zone. Make sure none of the Blip-Blops are sacrificed otherwise you will fail!

CONTROLS

WASD - Movement
Esc - Pause

CREDITS

Created in less than 1 week for the GoGodotJam by Bix Men.

All assets were created during the jam by me.
